mapper.sql: ps_id, p_id, s_id, p_user_id, s_user_id, ps_add_time, ps_status, ps_express_no
mapper.select: select t.*,d.* from ps_order t left join s_bid d on t.s_id = d.s_id where t.ps_id = #{psId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into ps_order (ps_id, p_id, s_id, p_user_id, s_user_id, ps_add_time, ps_status, ps_express_no) values (#{psId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{psAddTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{psStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{psExpressNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
